thread.title: Euro zone August industry output reverses after July energy gains
thread.title_full: Euro zone August industry output reverses after July energy gains - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: Euro zone August industry output reverses after July energy gains
text:
. View photo
Men work at the assembly line in the truck production plant of truck and bus-maker MAN AG in Munich, Germany July 30, 2015. REUTERS/Michaela Rehle 
BRUSSELS (Reuters) - Euro zone industrial production declined in line with expectations in August, as the energy sector reversed gains made in July and only durable consumer goods output showing robust expansion.
Industrial output in the 19 countries sharing the euro fell by 0.5 percent month-on-month for a 0.9 percent year-on-year gain, Eurostat said on Wednesday. Economists polled by Reuters had expected a 0.5 percent monthly decline and a 1.8 percent annual gain.
Eurostat also revised data for July to a 0.8 percent monthly fall from an increase of 0.6 percent and to a 1.7 percent year-on-year rise from the previously reported 1.9 percent.
The August monthly expansion was chiefly driven by a 2.3 percent increase in production on durable consumer goods. Intermediate good output expanded by 0.2 percent.
By contrast, energy production fell by 3.0 percent in the month after a 2.1 percent rise in July, which economists attributed to a heatwave early that month, with air conditioning on overdrive.

For details of Eurostat data click on: 
http://epp.eurostat.ec.europa.eu/portal/page/portal/eurostat/home/ 

(Reporting By Philip Blenkinsop)
